price: Make no excuses; you have disbelieved after having believed[59]. If We pardon some of you, We will punish others because they are wicked.
arabic: لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ قَدۡ كَفَرۡتُم بَعۡدَ إِيمَٰنِكُمۡۚ إِن نَّعۡفُ عَن طَآئِفَةٖ مِّنكُمۡ نُعَذِّبۡ طَآئِفَةَۢ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ
footnotes: [59] However, the door of repentance is still open for them.
